subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Ireland defeated Wales, 17-15, in Cardiff to win its first Six Nations grand slam since 1948. Ronan O’Gara dropped the winning goal with three minutes left after Brian O’Driscoll and Tommy Bowe had scored in quick succession to put Ireland ahead by 14-6 early in the second half. rugby.
